_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: phpMyAdmin Server
author: victor@vktrdev.cl

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

cd /mnt/server

apk --update add git

git clone https://github.com/Atomik0/phpMyAdmin-Pterodactyl ./temp

cp -r ./temp/nginx /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/php-fpm /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/webroot /mnt/server/
cp ./temp/start.sh /mnt/server/

rm /mnt/server/webroot/index.php
cp -a /mnt/server/phpmyadmin/. /mnt/server/webroot/
rm -rf /mnt/server/phpmyadmin/

chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh

rm -rf ./temp

cd /mnt/server/webroot/
wget https://files.phpmyadmin.net/phpMyAdmin/5.2.0/phpMyAdmin-5.2.0-all-languages.tar.gz
tar xfz phpMyAdmin-5.2.0-all-languages.tar.gz
mv phpmyadmin/* ./
rmdir ./phpmyadmin/
rm -f phpMyAdmin-5.2.0-all-languages.tar.gz
